MechanicWeb is a well-established web hosting company which has been in operations since 2008 and provides one stop solutions to its clients. Customer service is in the core of our services and we do not hesitate to reach beyond our scope to achieve customer satisfaction.

You are safe with us
  • 45 Day Money Back Guarantee
  • Daily Remote R1Soft CDP Backup
  • 24/7 Expert Support
  • 99.9% Uptime SLA

Services we offer
  • Shared Hosting
  • Reseller Hosting
  • Master Reseller Hosting

  • Domain
  • SSL Certificate
  • CodeGuard Cloud Backup
  • SiteLock Security
  • Domain, Hosted Email, SSL, CodeGuard & SiteLock Reseller
  • Website Design & Development

[ Get More for Less ]
We aim to reach beyond industry standards and include more features and resources with every service we offer. For example, we offer 5 Mbps IOPS on Pure SSD servers while the competition will limit you on 1 Mbps. IOPS is the truly deciding factor when it comes to website performance, page load times and other advantages related to it, such as SEO ranking and visibility on search results. Other features include daily malware scan, premium grade email with free SpamExperts outbound and tons more

We also have a wide range of products and value added services to accommodate everything that today’s business needs.
